author: bsunanda
body: Modify the AlCaRecoProducer fo IsoTrack as well as HBHEMuon and also the fliters/scripts to avoid any crash in RelVal steps. The changes need to be backported to the CMSSW version used in Tier0.
title: bsunanda:Run2-alca19 Fix for the crash in the relval for AlCa step with IsoTrack
